part1.title: Why only Counter-Strike?
part1.content: We wanted to add more games at first, but we never had neither time nor resources to do so... But we keep that in mind for one day maybe!

part2.title: Why don't you propose this one marketplace?
part2.content: We're sure that this service is super great, but we cannot include every marketplace that exists. But maybe if you are numerous enough to suggest this, we'll have a look one day or another!

part3.title: The price you showed was not right!
part3.content: Even though we aim for real-time pricing updates, we are technically not able to do so at the moment; which is why you may notice inconsistencies between the prices we show and the effective prices in the marketplaces.

part4.title: Are you related to this or that marketplace?
part4.content: No, we're not, LionSkins is independent. However, the Bitskins and Skinbaron links are affiliated, and we receive a commission if you buy on these marketplaces after using one of our links.

part5.title: Can I suggest you something?
part5.content: We'd love to hear about your ideas so that we make LionSkins better! Drop us a message from the <0>contact form</0>.
